channel.title: Anthony’s Coal Fired Pizza – Chow Down Orlando
channel.description: Exploring all that Orlando has to offer.

The post Anthony’s Coal Fired Pizza appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
This is Anthony’s Coal Fired Pizza. It’s “coal fired” in that it’s cooked in a very hot coal fire oven. Pretty straight forward. While I’m not sure we need another “Anthony’s” chain in town, this one has something unique to offer.

The top is cauliflower and the bottom is broccoli rob and sausage. While broccoli rob is an acquired taste, the cauliflower pizza is one of the best we’ve had in a long time. It was incredible.

Because of the extreme temperature the pizza is cooked, the crust is very crispy and, while I’m not usually a fan of thinner crust pizzas, this one was great. Giant slices with mounds of cheese and toppings. It was great.

You can find Anthony’s Coal Fired Pizza on Turkey Lake Road.

The post Anthony’s Coal Fired Pizza appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
